story_hook.opening_visual: A time-lapse of human evolution from cavemen to modern cityscapes, ending on a futuristic AI city.
story_hook.hook_concept: The rapid acceleration of human progress and the impending AI revolution.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Introduce the concept of exponential progress in human history.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual sets the stage for understanding how AI fits into the rapid pace of human advancement.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Narrate the acceleration of human progress, highlighting key milestones.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Illustrate the shock of a 1750 man transported to 2015.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual emphasizes the incomprehensible advancements from 1750 to 2015.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Describe the overwhelming experience of witnessing modern technology for the first time.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Compare the difference in progress between 1500-1750 and 1750-2015.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual highlights the exponential increase in the rate of progress.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Contrast the relatively minor changes from 1500 to 1750 with the massive leaps from 1750 to 2015.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Depict the concept of a Die Progress Unit (DPU).
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual illustrates the idea that future advancements could be so rapid they're shocking.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Explain how the rate of progress is increasing to the point where future changes could be overwhelming.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Show the impact of the Agricultural Revolution on human progress.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual demonstrates how the Agricultural Revolution marked a turning point in human history.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Describe the transition from hunter-gatherer societies to settled agricultural communities.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Illustrate the concept of the Industrial Revolution's impact on progress.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual shows how the Industrial Revolution drastically accelerated technological progress.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Highlight the key inventions and societal changes brought about by the Industrial Revolution.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Introduce the concept of AI as the next major leap in human progress.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual transitions the narrative to focus on the impending AI revolution.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Position AI as the next significant milestone in the exponential curve of human progress.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Visualize the potential future with advanced AI.
visual_segments.narrative_context: This visual offers a glimpse into a future transformed by AI.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Speculate on the possibilities and challenges of a world dominated by AI.

primary_concepts.visual_metaphor: A rocket taking off with increasing speed.
A human hand and a robotic hand reaching towards each other.

script_structure.call_to_action: Stay tuned for Part 2, where we delve deeper into the AI revolution and its implications for humanity.
